description:
Kirino, Kyousuke, and Kuroneko visit Saori`s apartment to try and surprise her, but the two girls start reproaching Kyousuke when he realizes he doesn`t know her room number. As the three of them stand there arguing, an elegant young woman appears before them. The moment she realizes it`s Kyousuke and the others, she covers her face and crouches down, crying out with a voice they all recognized.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mon amie n`est pas censée enlever ses lunettes
My Friend Can`t Take Off Her Glasses
Ore no Tomodachi ga Megame o Hazusu Wake ga Nai
俺の友達が眼鏡を外すわけがない
